article_title: Live updates from the Big Data and Healthcare Analytics Forum in Boston
article_text:
The Big Data and Healthcare Analytics Forum kicks off on Thursday in Boston, with a host of expert speakers set to discuss how healthcare is using clinical and business intelligence to drive quality improvements, efficiency gains and cost savings.

HealthcareITNews, which is running the event, will be sharing live updates from the conference below. Bookmark this page for real-time updates from the event.

Twitter: @HC_Finance
